page.title: 10Church Farm,Llanedeyrn
page.content: Mr.and Mrs.James bought the farm twelve years ago.The main products at that time were potatoes,cabbage,milk, beef,sheep,pigs and turkeys.The present crops grown are hay,barley and wheat.There are twenty eight horses on tack for hunting;mainly thoroughbreds. There are two Jersey cows which Mrs. James milks by hand.There is quite a large farm stores and corn stores. Twenty eight acres of land have been sold to the Welsh Office for factories but planning permission has not been recieved as yet.Within the next few years Mrs.James expects to see a road- way coming through the farm.
